Based on your preference for adult-themed movies, I'd recommend either 'RED' or 'Why Did I Get Married?'.

'RED' is an action-packed film starring Bruce Willis and Morgan Freeman that revolves around a group of retired special operatives who come together to take down a common enemy. If you enjoy thrilling stories with a touch of comedy, this could be a great fit!

On the other hand, 'Why Did I Get Married?' is a dramatic film that delves into the trials and tribulations of marriage. It features an ensemble cast including Janet Jackson and Tyler Perry, making for a compelling watch if you're interested in character-driven stories.

It stars talented actors like Roy Scheider, Keir Dullea, and Arthur C. Clarke, who contributed significantly to the story based on Clarke's novel "2010: Odyssey Two".

If you enjoy historical dramas, "Elizabeth" (1998) might also be an interesting watch for you. This film focuses on the early years of Queen Elizabeth I's reign and offers a captivating portrayal of her struggles as a young monarch, with Fanny Ardant and Eric Cantona among its star-studded cast. Enjoy the journey through time!

Stars like Tilda Swinton, Bill Murray, and Edward Norton add to its appeal.
